    Crystal Plasticity with DAMASK (27/11/24)

    Speaker and Affliation:

    Philip Eisenlohr
    Associate Chair - Materials Science and Engineering
    Associate Professor - Chemical Engineering and Materials Science, College of Engineering Michigan State University (USA)

    When?

    27th November, 2024 (Wednesday), 11.00 AM (India Standard Time)

    Where

    KPA Auditorium, Dept. of Materials Engineering, IISc, Bangalore

    Updated: November 27, 2024
